name: USBlyzer Data Capture File
summary: Learn about .ULZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Information captured by a ULZ file includes IRP and URB structures data, transfer buffer contents, and device and driver object names. May also contain information about USB-related requests, I/O request packets, and incoming and outgoing USB traffic.
ULZ files can be exported by USBlyzer for future reference.

description: Contains data captured by USBlyzer, a USB protocol analysis program; contains a hierarchy of connected USB devices with descriptive information about each device.
